Take <S%H3947><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he becomes <S%H6148><s%> surety <S%H6148><s%> for a stranger; <S%H2114><s%> And for foreigners, <S%H5237><s%> hold <S%H9111><s%> him in pledge. <S%H9111><s%>
